EmailTemplate.subject: EFS Account Information and Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today about opening an EFS account for {!Account.Name}.
I hope the information I have provided below is useful in making your decision. Please let me know if you have any questions.
The EFS Fleet Card advantage:
§ Best-in-class purchase and financial controls
§ Consolidated transactions on a single card
§ Better authorization controls
§ Card-level programming
§ Superior fraud prevention tools
§ Real-time online account reconciliation
§ 24/7 online and mobile access
§ Seamless system integration with leading third-party software providers
§ Fuel discounts available without extra costs or gallon commitments!
Standard Fees:
§ $50.00 – New Account Setup Fee (one-time fee)
§ $3.50 – EFS Check / MoneyCode fee (per $1,000)
§ $1.80 – Fuel transaction fee
§ $2.00 – Fuel with Cash Advance transaction fee
§ $3.00 – Cash Advance without fuel purchase transaction fee
§ $3.00 – ATM transaction
§ $55.99 – Monthly Account Maintenance Fee (MAMF)
§ For the complete fee table, please see page 2 of the EFS Application and Agreement
Application Instructions, by attachment:
Ø EFS Application and Agreement
This is the APPLICATION for the new account, and the most important document.
Ø EFS Account Data Sheet
general setup questions for how you want your limits set up. When in doubt, write “default.” Any decision you make here can be easily changed later when an Implementation Specialist calls you and walks you through your online account.
Ø EFS Pre-Fund Agreement (only for PrePay accounts)
This is the form acknowledging that you want a PREPAY account. Please sign and return the second page back to me. Please wait to fund your new account until I have provided you an Application ID#. VERY IMPORTANT!
Ø Direct Debit Form (only for Credit Line accounts)
Form Required to set up direct debit (ACH) if you chose this option on the application
Ø Personal Guaranty (only for Credit Line accounts)
Form used if you would like to apply for a credit line using a personal guaranty This form is optional Although not required, a personal guaranty often helps your chances of credit approval, especially if your business is less than 2 years old and your company does not have financial statements (income statement and balance sheet) readily available
If you have any questions about the application or your new fuel card program, please don’t hesitate to call or email me. We look forward to a long relationship with {!Account.Name}.
Kind Regards,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} EFS LLC & WEX Fleet One
Phone: {!User.Phone} | Fax: {!User.Fax}
{!User.Email} | www.efsllc.com | www.fleetone.com
